name: image-supervive
description: This package contains a curated collection of images from the game, Supervive by Theorycraft Games. The images are sourced from the community-run wiki (https://supervive.wiki.gg/) and are licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/). If any images are used inappropriately, please contact me for their immediate removal. Contributions to this repository are welcome!
author: Isaac Yong
